data.title: No Recurring Fees - Songs Stay Up Forever
data.meta_description: CD Baby - Independently distribute to Spotify, Apple Music, iTunes, Amazon, YouTube, TikTok, Pandora & more. Make money from your songs worldwide on 150+ trusted platforms.
data.text:
Release a single or album for just $9.99.

No subscription fees.

Lifetime distribution.

With CD Baby you’ll get:

Your music on 150+ global platforms like Spotify & Apple Music

Your tracks on video apps like TikTok & Instagram

Monetization with YouTube Content ID

Your songs on discovery tools like Shazam & Jaxsta

Consideration for promo services & playlist pitching

Fast-pass verification on major streaming services

An easy way to claim your YouTube Official Artist Channel

Free UPC barcode & ISRCs

Access to our expert artist support team

Powerful music marketing tools

Go beyond distribution.

Let's put your songs to work!

Global Music Distribution

Your music will be on Spotify, Apple Music, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Music, Amazon Music, Pandora, Deezer, and 150+ other platforms around the world. Keep ALL your rights. Get paid WEEKLY!

Music Marketing Tools

Included with your account is a suite of free marketing tools that will help your music go further. These are the same tools that major artists like Oasis, Maroon 5, Tove Lo, and Santana have used to boost their Spotify engagement, drive pre-saves, and grow their email lists.

Worldwide Monetization

Plus, you’ll be set up to earn additional music money beyond streaming and download income, including video monetization revenue when your tracks are used on social apps. By adding CDB Boost, you’ll also be eligible for sync licensing revenue, publishing royalty collection, and more.

Build a catalog of music without a lifetime of yearly fees.

We charge a ONE-TIME fee per release with NO annual fees. We keep just 9% of your digital distribution revenue and you get the remaining 91%. This structure incentivizes us to keep finding opportunities for ALL your music, not just your newest single.

It also means you won’t pay a growing bill every year just to keep your music available online. Beyond our initial setup fee, we only make money when you do, so you can continue to release music worry-free.

A UPC is required to distribute each submission. That’s because every digital platform reports your numbers to Nielsen SoundScan using the UPC. If you don’t have one, you can get a UPC from us for FREE.
